name: Gunship Missile Strike
description:
Gunship Missile Strike is a free battle game designed for IPhone and IPad.
Enemies have been located near the Mediterranean Sea; they have setup their military bases on the small islands and preparing for an offensive strike against your country. The army seems helpless, the ground attack is not possible, Navy seems stranded. The only chance of winning this war is an air strike. Launch the attack on the most dangerous terrorists now before its get too late.

You need to strategically use the powerful machine guns and devastating missiles to eliminate the one of the world’s greatest army. The Gunship Helicopter is installed with the radar system and it’s the latest combat helicopter of all time which will help you demolish the military bases. Experience the real war while being in the air using your combat tactics.

Test your flying skills and show no sympathy with the one you are fighting. Lets get ruthless when it comes to war.

Missile Strike Features:
-Realistic 3d environment
-Latest Apache Battle Helicopters to select
-Variety of Military gears to purchase from the store
-A lot of rewards to win
-Complex and challenging missions
